title: Evaluating accuracy and fairness of clinical decision support algorithms when health care resources are limited
details: EL Meerwijk, DC Mcelfresh, S Martins, SR Tamang - Journal of Biomedical Informatics, 2024
abstract: Objective Guidance on how to evaluate accuracy and algorithmic fairness across subgroups is missing for clinical models that flag patients for an intervention but when health care resources to administer that intervention are limited. We aimed to …
